channel.title: Posts on Tyler's Project Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Tyler's Project Blog

item.title: Setting Up Website
item.description: The tools used to design this website are Hugo and Nginx. I want a static site so Hugo is perfect for that. I chose Nginx because I want to lean more about it. I’m hosting this website on a VPS using Centos8. I’m designing the website using vscode on Arch Linux. There’s a few things I want to do here: Set up the website so it can be accessed from the web Add SSL certificate Harden Nginx settings Setting up the website The first thing is to create a new website with Hugo in the current directory on my own machine.

item.title: New Website
item.description: Welcome to a mostly tech blog. I created this to document my projects and ideas. I keep forgetting things and keep re-researching them. Hopefully this will help. I’m also hoping to improve my technical writing. I’ll get more stuff up here eventually, maybe mess with the theme. Probably could make an email with my own domain at some point. More projects to add. I’m currently working on setting up Pfsense at home, but waiting on some more ethernet to attach a Unifi Lite AP.
